full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Background
The Government of Canada invites suppliers to participate in a tender competition for the alongside refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) M. Charles.

## Solicitation Details

| **Parameter** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Contract Reference | PW-XLV-600-8407 | PW-XLV-600-8407 |
| Solicitation Number | F1782-22C034/A | F1782-22C034/A |
| Tender Closing Date | November 18, 2022, 2:00 PM EST | 18 novembre 2022, 14:00 HE |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 30, 2022 | Le 30 novembre 2022 |
| Expected Contract End Date | January 10, 2023 | Le 10 janvier 2023 |
| Trade Agreement | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive Open Bidding | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price (LPTA) | Prix le plus bas (LPTA) |

## Background and Requirements
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires contractors to refit the CCGS M. Charles, a ship of Western Canadian origin, in accordance with specified technical requirements.

## Procurement Strategy
The tender competition is open to suppliers with a Procurement Business Number (PBN), chosen from the Western Canadian area of origin, in accordance with Public Services and Procurement Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca guidelines.

## Documents and Attachments
Relevant bid solicitation documents and attachments can be found on the Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders website.

## Vendor Information

* Contact Name: Jason Smith
* Contact Email: [jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Telephone: (250) 217-7138
